coreAttributes.name: Flex Tape - Anal
coreAttributes.description: FLEX TAPE is a super strong, rubberized, waterproof tape that can patch, bond, seal and repair virtually anything, even your virginity! It is specially formulated with a thick, flexible, rubberized backing that conforms to any shape or object. This durable adhesive tape instantly seals out water, air and cum to create a super strong, flexible, watertight barrier. Prostitute approved!

displacementText.playerSelf: You very, very, VERY slowly peel the tape off your [pc.asshole+] and throw it away.
displacementText.playerNPC: You very, very slowly peel the tape off [npc.name]'s [npc.asshole+] and throw it away.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You pinch a corner of the tape, giving it a few frustrated tugs, before using your magic tear a hole in the centre. [npc.Name] can remove the rest [npc.herHim]self later. Not your problem.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] very, very, VERY slowly peels the tape off [npc.her] [npc.asshole+] and throws it away. It takes a lot of effort.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] very, very slowly peels the tape off your [pc.asshole+] and throws it away. It takes a lot of effort.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] pinches a corner of the tape, giving it a few frustrated tugs, before managing to tear it off, leaving your [pc.asshole+] puffed up and sore. That's a lotta damage!
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] very, very slowly peels the tape off [npc2.name]'s [npc2.asshole+] and throws is away. It takes a lot of effort.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] pinches a corner of the tape, giving it a few frustrated tugs, before managing to tear it off, leaving [npc2.name]'s [pc.asshole+] puffed up and sore. That's a lotta damage!

replacementText.playerSelf: #IF (!pc.isAssVirgin()) #THEN #IF (pc.setAssVirgin(1)!=null) #THEN You place a few strips of Flex Tape over your butt, rubbing them into all the wrinkles and creases of your [pc.asshole+]. #ELSE You place a few strips of Flex Tape over your butt, rubbing them into all the wrinkles and creases of your [pc.asshole+]. #ENDIF #ELSE You place a few strips of Flex Tape over your butt, rubbing them into all the wrinkles and creases of your [pc.asshole+]. #ENDIF

replacementText.playerNPCRough: #IF (!npc.isAssVirgin()) #THEN #IF (npc.setAssVirgin(1)!=null) #THEN You knock [npc.name] onto [npc.herHis] front, and slap the Flex Tape over [npc.herHis] [npc.asshole+]. #ELSE You knock [npc.name] onto [npc.herHis] front, and slap the Flex Tape over [npc.herHis] [npc.asshole+]. #ENDIF #ELSE You knock [npc.name] onto [npc.herHis] front, and slap the Flex Tape over [npc.herHis] [npc.asshole+]. #ENDIF
